import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react" import TopMusicList from "./topmusiclist" function Toptitle(props){ let [music,setmusic] = useState(0) let muUrl = function(link){ setmusic(link) } let location = muUrl() console.log(location) return(

{props.data.length===0?"":props.data.playlist.name}
) } export default Toptitle
